name: Aladdin Ali
title: Backend engineer specializing in C#/.NET systems and regulated platforms
about: Backend engineer with math/RTP simulation experience, regulated RGS integrations, and a habit of keeping systems observable.
I build C#/.NET services, Dockerized pipelines, and plugin-first architectures that shorten delivery without losing rigor.
Equally comfortable designing APIs and SQL schemas as I am shaping a clear Next.js surface for stakeholders.
buildingNow: Plugin-based auditing for gaming services, AI-assisted debugging loops, and a lean nebula web shell.
